s0043: Yue Shi Fu was worthy, in fetters and handcuffs.
s0044: Yan Zi went out, encountered him on the road, unyoked the left trace horse to redeem him, carried him home.
s0045: Did not thank him, entered the inner chambers.
s0046: After a long time, Yue Shi Fu requested to break off relations.
s0047: Yan Zi fearfully adjusted his clothing and cap apologized saying: 'Ying though unbenevolent, saved you from hempen bonds, why do you seek to break off so quickly?'
s0049: I have heard that gentlemen bend to those who do not know them but extend faith to those who know them.
s0050: When I was in fetters and handcuffs, they did not know me.
s0051: Master having already been moved and redeemed me, this is knowing me;
s0052: knowing me yet without ritual, certainly not as good as being in fetters and handcuffs.'
s0053: Yan Zi then invited him in as honored guest.
s0054: When Yan Zi was prime minister of Qi, going out, his charioteer's wife peeked at her husband from the gate.
s0055: Her husband drove the prime minister's chariot, held the large canopy, whipped the four horses, spirit and energy soaring very self-satisfied.
s0056: Having returned home, his wife requested to leave.
s0058: The wife said: 'Yan Zi height not full six feet, personally prime minister of Qi state, name illustrious among feudal lords.
s0059: Now when I observed his going out, his thoughts and reflections were deep, constantly had ways to humble himself.
s0060: Now you are eight feet tall, yet serve as another's charioteer, yet your intentions consider yourself sufficient, therefore I request to leave.'
s0062: Yan Zi was surprised and asked him, the charioteer told the truth.
